item.title: Adding rank restrictions to ::yell command, 317 pi
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

messageToAll isn’t in 99% of PI’s
Therefore you need to use a for loop:

			for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
				if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
					Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
                                        c2.sendMessage(Misc.optimizeText(c.displayName) +": "+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)));
                                 }
                         }

item.source: Adding rank restrictions to ::yell command, 317 pi

item.title: Adding rank restrictions to ::yell command, 317 pi
item.dc:creator: @ReaperXScape ReaperXScape
item.description:
@ReaperXScape wrote:

omfg why dont you use a simple one… its simple as this
ill write this right now in 10 secs…

if (command.startsWith("yell ") && playerRights >= 1) {
String text = command.substring(5);
String yelltag = “”;

switch (playerRights) {
case 0:
yelltag = “Player”;
break;
case 1:
yelltag = “Mod”;
break;
case 2:
yelltag = “Admin”;
break;
case 3:
yelltag = “Owner”;
break;
case 4:
yelltag = “Donator”;
break;
}
playerHandler.messageToAll = “”+yelltag+" “+playerName+” : “+text+”";
}

there… its simple as that, (you may need to change like 3 codes, depending on your server base)

Read full topic

item.title: Adding rank restrictions to ::yell command, 317 pi
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Undo all your changes before you tried editing the yell command, and then do this:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:12, topic:519438”]Alright this is really bugging me.
In Commands.java search:

String playerCommand = c.getInStream()

Should look like:

String playerCommand = c.getInStream().readString();

Change it to this:

String playerCommand = c.getInStream().readString().toLowerCase();

Now.
Make the start of your yell command look like:

if(playerCommand.startsWith("yell") && c.playerRights == 3){ [/quote]

item.title: Adding rank restrictions to ::yell command, 317 pi
item.dc:creator: @bob2568 bob2568
item.description:
@bob2568 wrote:

Alright.
Well this is exactly what i have.
[sup] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”) || playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“Yell”) || playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“YELL”) || playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“yel”)) <— when i add the && playerRights = 4) it gives errors stating it cannot find the symbol, variable playerRights… even if i remove one of the parenthesis.
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];

						if (!Connection.isMuted(c)) {
						if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("GanGHack")){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=800000000><img=1>[MAIN OWNER]</col><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +":</col> "
						                                        + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("GanGHack")) {
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=800000000><img=1>[MAIN OWNER]</col><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                                                    }else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("")) {
							c2.sendMessage("<col225><shad=838383><img=1>[Head-Admin]</col><img=1><shad=838383>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 2){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=200000000>[Admin]</col><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 1){
							c2.sendMessage("<col=255><shad=255>[Mod]</col><img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                                                    }else if (c.playerRights == 3){
							c2.sendMessage("<img=1><shad=330000>[Co-Owner]<img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                                                    }else if (c.playerRights == 4 && c.issDonator == 0){
							c2.sendMessage("<col=800000000><shad=255>[Donator]<img=3>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                                                    }else if (c.playerRights == 4 && c.issDonator == 1){
							c2.sendMessage("<col=225><shad=255>[Super Donator]<img=3>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 0){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>[Player]</col>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
								
						}
					}
				}
			}  [/sup]

item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“JavaLearner, post:5, topic:519438”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=637902.msg4299763#msg4299763 date=1368799623]
Adam you didn’t even write that code. So don’t act like you’re so badass.
Reaper is correct, but personally, I’d do something like this:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell") || playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("Yell") || playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("YELL") || playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("yel") && playerRights == X)
{
//Yell Code here
}

You’d obviously need to change X
[/quote]
I assume your equalsIgnoreCase must be startsWith[/quote]
I didn’t write all that, I took it from his post.
But honestly, I wouldn’t use that at all.
The first thing I’d do is make all playerCommands to be parsed into lower case (did it on my server), and then I’d have

if(playerCommand.startsWith("yell") && playerRights == X){ //yell command }

item.title: Adding rank restrictions to ::yell command, 317 pi
item.dc:creator: @adamgulka adamgulka
item.description:
@adamgulka wrote:

I hope you like being fed with a spoon, because that’s exactly whats going to happen!

[code] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”)) {
/*
*This is the sensor for the yell command
*/
String text = playerCommand.substring(5);
String[] bad = {“Fuck”, “Nigger”, “Cunt”, “Faggot”};
for(int i = 0; i < bad.length; i++){
if(text.indexOf(bad[i]) >= 0){
return;
}
}
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];

				if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("")) {
					c2.sendMessage("<shad=15369497>[Extreme Donator]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
					+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
				} else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Adam")) {
					c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415><img=1>[Owner]<img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
					+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
				} else if (c.isDonator == 1 && (c.playerRights == 4 )) {
					c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134><img=2>[Donator]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
					+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
				} else if (c.playerRights == 1) {
					c2.sendMessage("<shad=3781373><img=0>[Moderator]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
					+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
				} else if (c.playerRights == 2) {
					c2.sendMessage("<shad=16112652><img=0>[Administrator]<img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
					+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
				} else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Adam")) {
					c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415><img=1>[Owner]<img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
					+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
				} else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Co-Owner")) {
					c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Co-Owner]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
					+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
				} else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Developer")) {
					c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Developer]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
					+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
				} else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Adam")) {
					c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415><img=1>[Owner]<img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
					+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
				} else if (c.isDonator == 0) {
					c.sendMessage("You must be a donator to use this command!");
				} else {
					if (c.isInJail()) {
						c.sendMessage("You cannot yell while you are in Jail!");
						return;
					}
					
				}
			}
		}
	}

}


public void moderatorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand)
{[/code]

That there is my yell command, and of course replace any name with yours and anyone else, it has player rights = 2 and = 1 being admin and mod, but for some there is ("") for there name and just change it to like (“MYNAME”)
Hope I helped!!
